channel.title: Healing spell!
channel.description:
Hi,
dont usualy post for much but i REALY want ahealing spell,!?!
Im willing to give up any of my spells.
It would be cool to make it so thay cant mass the spell or anythign like that,
SUM 1 PLZ!!! show or tell me how to make 1 :'(

item.title: Healing spell!
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

or replace with
** !NOTE: THIS IS IN MAGIC ON PLAYERS! **

if(magicID == 1152) // Wind strike { if(playerLevel[6] >= 1) { if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==true)) { setAnimation(1819); p2.playerLevel[3] += 10; stillgfx(436, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); //PkingDelay = 15; addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[6]), 6); //sendMessage("You heal the other player!"); deleteItem(558, getItemSlot(558), 1); deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 1); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; //castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 1) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 1 to cast this spell."); } }

p2 stand for player 2
if you don’t have p2
add

client p2 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];

This is how it goes:

Use wind strike on somebody … You will do TeleBlock emote , the other player gets the gfx from redemption prayer and gets healed with 10 hp

** ! NOTE: This maybe could have a few errors ! **

Read full topic

item.title: Healing spell!
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

He wants a healing spell. If the code you posted you took from Blood Barrage, then you will need to attack someone for it to heal you. I think he wants a spell that just heals you, without having to attack something.

Read full topic

item.title: Healing spell!
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

Sorry , My friend was bitching 4 days at me to make a healing skill -.-

yeah add

NewHP += hitDiff / 2;
if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) {
NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]);

hitDiff / 2;

If you do a 28 hit you get 14 hp i suggest change it to /4

Read full topic
